body: diversity-inclusion-policy.aspx.Assisted Living and Social Services (ALSS) provides supports for seniors, families, and communities, and helps Albertans access disability services, continuing care, financial supports, affordable housing, services for the homeless, and other social-based programs. The Ministry supports Albertans through a person-centered, integrated service delivery model that recognizes the unique circumstances, experiences and strengths of individuals and families. For more information on the ALSS Ministry, please visit: https://www.alberta.ca/assisted-living-and-social-services The Office of the Public Guardian and Trustee (OPGT) provides essential support for individuals that are not able to make personal or financial decisions. It offers guardianship and trusteeship services, administers estates, and manages benefits. OPGT also oversees capacity assessments, investigates complaints regarding decision-makers, and provides guidance on advance planning and personal directives. For more information on OPGT, please visit: https://www.alberta.ca/opgt-supports

role_responsibilities.heading: Role Responsibilities
intro_paragraphs: The Office of the Public Guardian and Trustee (OPGT) is dedicated to providing high-quality services to Albertans. We are looking for a dynamic Records Management Supervisor to lead the records management operations.

responsibility_groups.heading: Responsibilities
items: Supervise records management administrative staff. Monitor workloads and standards to ensure effective workflow and use of manpower. Provide training and development opportunities. Establish unit goals and objectives to meet branch requirements.
Monitor workloads and standards to ensure effective workflow and use of manpower.
Provide training and development opportunities.
Establish unit goals and objectives to meet branch requirements.

Supervise the operation of the records management unit and assume responsibility for the effective and efficient performance of the unit. Establish and update policy and procedure manual. Develop and implement suggestions for continuous improvement and make recommendations. Responsible for information retrieval from PTIS and OPGIS. Coordinate the flow of documentation to create or conclude case management.
Ensure correct file classifications, file records, and retrieve records.

Perform file maintenance and set-up to ensure that OPGT files are accessible. Verify file classification and consult with branch or records analyst on any issues. Sort documents, prepare documents for filing, and file documents. Identify and locate records and arrange their delivery. Identify misfiled documents on existing files and cross-reference documents where required.
